title: ssis remove the duplicate by lookup to empty destination
body:
change the oledb source from Table to SQLCOMMAND and use The DISTINCT option in th sql query if the entire record is duplicated. EX:

SELECT DISTINCT * FROM Table1

If the duplication is in specific Column Use THE ROW_NUMBER() Function. Example:

SELECT * FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY Col1,Col2 ORDER BY Col1,Col2) AS [ROWNUMBER],* FROM Table1) AS T1
WHERE T1.ROWNUMBER = 1
